snippet: Mitsubishi UFJ Lease and Finance has agreed to acquire Jackson Square Aviation, an aircraft leasing company based in San Francisco, from Oaktree Capital Management for 100 billion yen.
abstract: Mitsubishi UFJ Lease and Finance has agreed to acquire Jackson Square Aviation, an aircraft leasing company based in San Francisco, from Oaktree Capital Management for 100 billion yen.

headline.main: Mitsubishi Unit Buys Aircraft Leasing Firm From Oaktree for $1.3 Billion
